page.title: 07The Shop Manager.
page.content: My job is affected by the weather and the time of year.I have to make sure there are adequate supplies for everyone as there is no other shop they can use.Also during the summer we get supplies on 3 days a week,so with large numbers of visitors,this takes a lot of planning.During the winter we can experience long periods of bad weather which may mean that we don't get fresh supplies for over a week. This has to be taken into consideration when submitting orders. Personally I found my first winter on Lundy quite a novelty,having had a regular 9-5 job for many years. However last winter I felt depressed for sometime during January and February.Once the better weather arrived we started receiving large numbers of visitors and my days got much more interesting.
